attributes.additional_details:
Rebuild credibility in English politics by removing from political office those who have abused the MP's expenses system for their own ends regardless of the amount, manipulated tax loopholes to ensure they do not contribute to society, have been prosecuted for any offence that would be liable to call into question their ability to provide a demonstration of sound moral principles or abstain from voting in key debates or follow the party whip when they were elected to represent constituents views.

Only then can politicians take a platform with any credibility and work WITH society to rebuild respect and rebuild this once great country.
